SELECT DISTINCT(A.TP_NUM) , A.STU_NUM , A.TP_DT , A.TP_AMT , CASE WHEN B.SL_AMT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.SL_AMT END SL_AMT, SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,1,4) ||'년 ' TP_YEAR, SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,6,6) ||'학기' TP_SEMESTER, A.TP_YN, CASE WHEN A.TP_AMT - SL_AMT IS NULL THEN A.TP_AMT ELSE A.TP_AMT - SL_AMT END TOTAL
FROM TUITION_PAY A , ( SELECT E.SR_NUM, E.STU_NUM ,E.SR_SEMESTER ,E.SR_DATE, F.SL_NM, SL_AMT FROM SCHOLARSHIP_REDETAIL E , SCHOLARSHIP_LIST F WHERE E.SL_NUM = F.SL_NUM) B WHERE A.TP_SEMESTER = B.SR_SEMESTER(+) AND A.STU_NUM = #{stuNum} ORDER BY TP_DT DESC

WITH T AS( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY U.TP_YEAR DESC, U.TP_SEMESTER ASC,U.TP_YN ASC) RNUM, U.TP_YEAR,U.TP_SEMESTER,U.DEPT_NM, U.STU_NM_KOR, U.STU_NUM, U.TP_YN, U.STU_PN FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,1,4) ||'년' TP_YEAR, SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,6,6) ||'학기' TP_SEMESTER, C.DEPT_NM, B.STU_NM_KOR, A.STU_NUM, A.TP_YN, B.STU_PN FROM TUITION_PAY A, STUDENT B, DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.STU_NUM = B.STU_NUM AND B.DEPT_NUM = C.DEPT_NUM AND SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,1,4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,1,4) ||'년' TP_YEAR, SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,6,6) ||'학기' TP_SEMESTER, C.DEPT_NM, B.STU_NM_KOR, A.STU_NUM, A.TP_YN, B.STU_PN FROM TUITION_PAY A, STUDENT B, DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.STU_NUM = B.STU_NUM AND B.DEPT_NUM = C.DEPT_NUM AND SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,1,4) < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') ) U ) SELECT T.RNUM, T.TP_YEAR, T.TP_SEMESTER, T.DEPT_NM, T.STU_NM_KOR, T.STU_NUM, T.TP_YN , T.STU_PN FROM T WHERE T.RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * #{size}) - (#{size} - 1) and (#{currentPage} * #{size})

SELECT C.DEPT_NM, A.STU_NUM, B.STU_NM_KOR, B.STU_PN FROM TUITION_PAY A, STUDENT B, DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.STU_NUM = B.STU_NUM AND B.DEPT_NUM = C.DEPT_NUM AND B.STU_NUM = #{stuNum} AND A.TP_SEMESTER LIKE '%2023-01%'

WITH T AS( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TP_NUM DESC) RNUM, SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,1,4) ||'년' TP_YEAR, SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,6,6) ||'학기' TP_SEMESTER, C.DEPT_NM, B.STU_NM_KOR, A.STU_NUM, A.TP_YN, B.STU_PN FROM TUITION_PAY A, STUDENT B, DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.STU_NUM = B.STU_NUM AND B.DEPT_NUM = C.DEPT_NUM ORDER BY TP_YEAR ) SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL FROM T WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(CL_SEMESTER,1,4)) CL_SEMESTER FROM COURSE_LIST ORDER BY CL_SEMESTER DESC

WITH T AS( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TP_NUM DESC) RNUM, SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,1,4) ||'년' TP_YEAR, SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,6,6) ||'학기' TP_SEMESTER, C.DEPT_NM, B.STU_NM_KOR, A.STU_NUM, A.TP_YN, B.STU_PN FROM TUITION_PAY A, STUDENT B, DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.STU_NUM = B.STU_NUM AND B.DEPT_NUM = C.DEPT_NUM ORDER BY TP_YEAR ) SELECT MAX(T.RNUM) FROM T WHERE 1 = 1

WITH T AS( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TP_NUM DESC) RNUM, SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,1,4) ||'년' TP_YEAR, SUBSTR(A.TP_SEMESTER,6,6) ||'학기' TP_SEMESTER, C.DEPT_NM, B.STU_NM_KOR, A.STU_NUM, A.TP_YN, B.STU_PN FROM TUITION_PAY A, STUDENT B, DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.STU_NUM = B.STU_NUM AND B.DEPT_NUM = C.DEPT_NUM ORDER BY TP_YEAR ) SELECT T.RNUM, T.TP_YEAR, T.TP_SEMESTER, T.DEPT_NM, T.STU_NM_KOR, T.STU_NUM, T.TP_YN , T.STU_PN FROM T WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY TP_YEAR DESC, TP_SEMESTER DESC
